about_the_game:
“Love thy neighbor”. Or so the saying goes at least. Well. On some days that might just not be what you want to do at all. Prepare, gear up and vandalize your way through your neighbors defenses to get the better of them.

NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted team-based multiplayer game for up to 8 players that features a wide range of items, abilities and base-building. All set in the lovely neighborhoods in the grand city of Heartsville.

Heartsville is the home of many unique neighbors for you to meet and play as. From the old cheerful Doreen to the little annoying brat that is Kevin, there is sure to be a neighbor you can relate to.

As the seasons come and go, more neighbors will move into the neighborhoods of Heartsville.

  • Play as 8 Unique Neighbors with more to come

  • Each Neighbor starts with their own unique item and ability

  • Unlock new hobbies and perks as you play

It is always a good idea to be prepared for intruders. Strategize, purchase and fortify your house with a wide range of utility and traps. Don’t forget to tend to the garden where you can plant all kinds of fruits and vegetables to aid you in the battle.

  • Place traps in clever ways and fortify your perimeter

  • Expands on your garden and house with new additions

  • Gear up for the offensive

While a good defense will come in handy, you know what they say: The best defense is a good offense. In NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare there are several ways to victory and neighborhood glory. It is up to you if you want to take the sneaky path or go in loud with a bang. Whether you are destroying you neighbor’s House Essentials, stealing their precious Garden Gnome or duking it out for most Knock Outs in Backyard Brawling, each game mode will require different skills and tactics.

However, no matter which path you choose you need to be clever about how to use the tools at hand.

  • Different Gamemodes: Total Destruction, Backyard Brawling, Steal the Gnome

  • Endless combinations of both ranged and melee tactics available

Enjoy a stroll down the harmonious Harmony Lane or the serene Serenity Summit. As time goes by more Neighborhoods will be opened up in Heartsville for you to brawl it out in. However, no matter which neighborhood you end up playing in, choosing your house will be critical.

In NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare, your home is your battleground. Choose between different houses and, with time, customize them to stand out among your neighbors.

  • 5 different houses to play in with more added regularly

We are hard at work at the HEARTSVILLE EVENT CALENDAR so please check back in soon to see the upcoming events and updates.

We wish you a pleasant stay!
detailed_description:
Community


Join our discord to get more details on playtests. Link on the right pane ->

name: Neighbors: Suburban Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 4130, AMD FX-4150
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted, team-based PvP game about neighborhood warfare! Deploy traps and barricades to defend your own house. Strategize and gather resources from your surroundings to acquire crazy items to get the better of your Neighbors!
supported_languages: English, Danish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
